languages.text: "Комморра — это лабиринт, найти выход из которого не всегда под силу даже его обитателям. Но нас направлял Аребенниан — один из властителей Паутины. Он точно знал, куда подтолкнуть своих актеров".

"Commorragh is a labyrinth. Finding the way out is not always possible, even for its inhabitants. But we were guided by an Arebennian, one of the rulers of the Webway. He knew exactly in which direction to nudge his actors."
languages.original_text: "Комморра — это лабиринт, найти выход из которого не всегда под силу даже его обитателям. Но нас направлял Аребенниан — один из властителей Паутины. Он точно знал, куда подтолкнуть своих актеров".

"Commorragh is a labyrinth. Finding the way out is not always possible, even for its inhabitants. But we were guided by Arebennian, one of the rulers of the Webway. He knew exactly in which direction to nudge his actors."

languages.text: “科摩罗是座迷宫，找到出路的可能性并不高。即便对它的居民来说，也同样如此。但考虑到指引我们的人是位独角，而他是网道的统治者之一，他应该很清楚该把演员推到哪个方向。”
languages.original_text: "Commorragh is a labyrinth. Finding the way out is not always possible, even for its inhabitants. But we were guided by an Arebennian, one of the rulers of the Webway. He knew exactly in which direction to nudge his actors."

traits.locale_text: “科摩罗是座迷宫，找到出路的可能性并不高。即便对它的居民来说，也同样如此。但考虑到指引我们的人是位独角，而他是网道的统治者之一，他应该很清楚该把演员推到哪个方向。”

languages.text: « Commorragh est un labyrinthe dont même les habitants peinent parfois à trouver la sortie. Mais nous avons été guidés par un Arebennian, l'un des dirigeants de la Toile, qui savait parfaitement dans quelle direction pousser ses acteurs... »
languages.original_text: "Commorragh is a labyrinth. Finding the way out is not always possible, even for its inhabitants. But we were guided by an Arebennian, one of the rulers of the Webway. He knew exactly in which direction to nudge his actors."

traits.locale_text: « Commorragh est un labyrinthe dont même les habitants peinent parfois à trouver la sortie. Mais nous avons été guidés par un Arebennian, l'un des dirigeants de la Toile, qui savait parfaitement dans quelle direction pousser ses acteurs... »

languages.text: «Commorragh es un laberinto. Ni siquiera sus habitantes son siempre capaces de encontrar la salida. Pero nos ha guiado un Arebennian, uno de los gobernantes de la Telaraña. Sabía exactamente en qué dirección empujar a sus actores».
languages.original_text: "Commorragh is a labyrinth. Finding the way out is not always possible, even for its inhabitants. But we were guided by an Arebennian, one of the rulers of the Webway. He knew exactly in which direction to nudge his actors."

traits.locale_text: «Commorragh es un laberinto. Ni siquiera sus habitantes son siempre capaces de encontrar la salida. Pero nos ha guiado un Arebennian, uno de los gobernantes de la Telaraña. Sabía exactamente en qué dirección empujar a sus actores».

languages.text: 「コモラフは迷宮だ。脱出路が必ず見つかるわけではなく、その住人にもしかりだ。だが、網辻の支配者のひとり、アーベニアンの案内があった。役者の注意がどこに向いていたのかを彼は正確に知っていた」
languages.original_text: "Commorragh is a labyrinth. Finding the way out is not always possible, even for its inhabitants. But we were guided by an Arebennian, one of the rulers of the Webway. He knew exactly in which direction to nudge his actors."

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフは迷宮だ。脱出路が必ず見つかるわけではなく、その住人にもしかりだ。だが、網辻の支配者のひとり、アーベニアンの案内があった。役者の注意がどこに向いていたのかを彼は正確に知っていた」

languages.text: "Commorragh ist ein Labyrinth. Es ist nicht immer möglich, einen Weg hinaus zu finden, nicht einmal für die Bewohner selbst. Aber wir wurden von einem Arebennian geführt, einem der Herrscher über das Netz der Tausend Tore. Er wusste genau, in welche Richtung er seine Schauspieler lotsen musste."
languages.original_text: "Commorragh is a labyrinth. Finding the way out is not always possible, even for its inhabitants. But we were guided by an Arebennian, one of the rulers of the Webway. He knew exactly in which direction to nudge his actors."

languages.original_text: "Commorragh is a labyrinth. Finding the way out is not always possible, even for its inhabitants. But we were guided by Arebennian, one of the rulers of the Webway. He knew exactly in which direction to nudge his actors."

languages.text: "Commorragh bir labirenttir. Buranın sakinleri için bile çıkış yolunu bulmak her zaman mümkün değildir. Fakat biz, Ağyol hükümdarlarından biri olan Arebennian tarafından yönlendirildik. Aracılarını hangi yöne götüreceğini biliyordu."
languages.original_text: "Commorragh is a labyrinth. Finding the way out is not always possible, even for its inhabitants. But we were guided by an Arebennian, one of the rulers of the Webway. He knew exactly in which direction to nudge his actors."
